pages.text: curses are malicious magic cast with a brazier.$(br2)to cast an effective curse, you will need the taglock of your target and put it in the brazier, in addition to the other ingredients.$(br2)after putting in all of the ingredients, light the brazier to cast the curse.
do note that all curses need at least 400 me available.$(br2)curses will wear off after seven days, but they can also be cleansed using the respective ritual.
